actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to limit the interest rates charged under certain farm credit loan programs administered by the Secretary of Agriculture.

summary.text: Amends the Emergency Agricultural Credit Act of 1978 and the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to limit the interest rates charged for economic emergency, farm ownership, and farm operating loans.

titles.title: A bill to limit the interest rates charged under certain farm credit loan programs administered by the Secretary of Agriculture.
